name: color_of_sound
prompt: In this world, every sound has a visible color. A musician accidentally plays a forbidden note. Describe the scene through sight, not hearing.
decoded: The musician's fingers dance across the keys, and the sound of the forbidden note manifests as a swirling, swirling vortex of vibrant, unnatural colors. The air is filled with an otherworldly energy, and the colors seem to pulse and shift, creating a mesmerizing display that draws the attention of the audience.
